The mobile application in the ap-northeast-1 region is experiencing critical performance issues characterized by a high load time of 6139.11 ms and multiple recent errors. Customers are facing slow page loads, which can lead to frustration and decreased engagement. This issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: mobile-app
Region: ap-northeast-1

Event Type: frontend
